_header: Saint John in our Gospel shows
Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 4645.
_description: Gospel for the Third Sunday after Easter in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
SAynte Ione in oure gospell schawesHow ihesus spak to his
                    felawes…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Bot als ane oure of a daieAls bi a tale tell ȝou i
                    maye
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Ion in vr gospel schawesHou crist spac to his
                    felawes…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…As hit weore þe þridde part a dayAs beo a tale here
                    ȝe may
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
SEynt Ione vs telles þe euangelistÞat to his disciples
                    saide ihesu crist…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Als to were thrid part a dayAls by a tale ȝe here
                    may
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Dominica iia post octava Pasche secundum Iohannem (p.
                    194)

CULDd11.First Lines:
SEynt Iohn in oure Gospel schawishow crist spak to his
                    felawisand seyde a litil while schal be…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…As it were þe thrid part of a dayas be a fayr tale heren
                    ȝe may
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Dominica 3a post Pascha euangelium secundum Iohannem (f.
                    125

CULGg531.First Lines:
…And spak þus to þaim all by deneOf my wordes thynk
                    ȝou ferly…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Bot as ane houre of a dayAls by a tale schew ȝow I
                    may

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Saynt Iohn in oure gospell vs scheweshow Ihesu spake tyll hys
                    felowes…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…als yt was þe threde parte a dayals ȝe here be a
                    tale se may
MinULZ822.Attributed Title:
Dominica secunda post octavas pasche Secundum Iohannem (f.
                    89)

HunHM129.First Lines:
Seint Ion in oure gospell schawysHow crist spak to his
                    fellawis…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…As hit ware þrydparte a dayAs ȝe here by a tale se
                    may
